payload.content: To become 'AI native,' one can progress through 5 levels, starting from basic voice dictation and culminating in personal AI agents that manage aspects of one's life.

name: To become 'AI native,' one can progress through 5 levels, starting from basic vo
content: To become 'AI native,' one can progress through 5 levels, starting from basic voice dictation and culminating in personal AI agents that manage aspects of one's life.

payload.content: The 5 levels to become AI native are: Level 1 (where 99% of people are stuck), Level 2 (voice, meetings, projects), Level 3 (prototyping before specs), Level 4 (building apps with AI), and Level 5 (AI as a personal agent).

name: The 5 levels to become AI native are: Level 1 (where 99% of people are stuck), L
content: The 5 levels to become AI native are: Level 1 (where 99% of people are stuck), Level 2 (voice, meetings, projects), Level 3 (prototyping before specs), Level 4 (building apps with AI), and Level 5 (AI as a personal agent).

payload.content: 80% of the value derived from AI for the author comes from Level 2 applications, which involve voice, meetings, and projects.

name: 80% of the value derived from AI for the author comes from Level 2 applications,
content: 80% of the value derived from AI for the author comes from Level 2 applications, which involve voice, meetings, and projects.

payload.content: To accelerate AI native development, one can scale from Level 1 to Level 5 within a week.
